full_text:
Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 76316-054
From Charisma Edge
To Lamine N'Diaye
Date 2019/08/01 16:19
Subject: Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 76316-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm, 2019_08_01_16_18_51.pdf, Charisma Edge.vcf
Just in case you need a synopsis of his activity......
Wed 7/31/19
Rec 6:30 - 7:30 a.m.
Court 9:30 - 11:30 am
Thursday 8/1/19
Atty conference beginning 9:00 am - present
Taken off psych ops on Tues 7/30/19. Seen by psych next day as a standard practice. Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) conducted today by [redacted]. Findings indicate he is psychologically stable. Per [redacted]. SRA was initiated because Epstein returned from court w a note indicating suicidal tendencies. see attachment
Charisma Edge
Associate Warden (O)
FCI Estill
100 Prison Road
Estill, SC 29918
803-625-[redacted]
[redacted]@bop.gov
EST/AW-Operations~@bop.gov
